metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3573 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In libsixel v1.8.2, there is an infinite loop in the function sixel_decode_raw_impl() in the file fromsixel.c, as demonstrated by sixel2png.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-3573` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel1 - 1.8.2-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-2.1').
